American Community Survey Elimination Act
To terminate the American Community Survey, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary:
American Community Survey Elimination Act or the ACSE Act
This bill prohibits the Department of Commerce or the U.S. Census Bureau from carrying out the American Community Survey (ACS) and bars the obligation or expenditure of federal funds to carry out that survey or any similar survey. Currently, the ACS is conducted on a rolling basis by the Census Bureau and covers topics not included on theÂ decennial census, such as education, military service, and internet access.
